# add2bibtex

The goal of add2bibtex is to help users to easily to use bibtex or bibLatex.

## Installation

You can install the released version of add2bibtex from [Github](https://github.com/JiaxiangBU/add2bibtex) with:

```{r eval=F}
devtools::install_github('JiaxiangBU/add2bibtex')
```

```{r eval=F}
library(add2bibtex)
```
